meanings.definition: A person or thing that has an effect or influence on something.
meanings.sent1: The impacters in the community worked together to create positive change.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the impacters of climate change on wildlife populations.
meanings.sent3: The impacters, like a team of superheroes, joined forces to save the day.
meanings.sent4: Her words were impacters, leaving a lasting impact on everyone who heard them.
meanings.sent5: The impacters of kindness and generosity can brighten even the darkest days.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used to make an impression or mark.
meanings.sent1: The artist used various impacters to create intricate designs on the clay.
meanings.sent2: A hammer can be an impacters when shaping metal into different forms.
meanings.sent3: The impacters, like a magical wand, transformed the plain paper into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was an impacters, leaving a unique mark on every project she touched.
